hanzi-su-wiki:
資

Значения

Средства, материалы; капитал

Мнемоника

Следующие 次 за вложенным капиталом деньги 貝, прибыль.

Варианты

资
purpleculture_pinyin:
zī
resources; capital; to provide; to supply; to support; money; expense
Ресурсы; капитал; предоставлять; поставлять; поддерживать; Деньги; расход
rtega_mnemonic:
資資RS
资资		property, wealth, capital, assets, resources, contribute
  • people ranked 次 according to money 貝: wealth
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 资)
Pictophonetic: 次 indicates the sound; 貝 (money) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
資金 [ zī jīn ]: funds; funding; capital
資源 [ zī yuán ]: Ziyuan county in Guilin 桂林 , Guangxi
資源 [ zī yuán ]: natural resource (such as water or minerals); resource (such as manpower or tourism)
資料 [ zī liào ]: material; resources; data; information; profile (Internet); Classifiers: 份
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 次 [ cì ] order, sequence; second, next; one after the other

heisig_chinese_memo: Assets are the next best thing to money.
heisig_constituent: assets, next, ice, lack, yawn, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
heisig_story: The first shells (money) you earn, you use to pay your debts. From then on, the next shells you accumulate become your assets.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: assets, resources, capital, funds, data, be conducive to, contribute to
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: активы, ресурсы, капитал, фонды, данные, будет способствовать, содействовать
koohiiStory1: Assets are the next best thing to money.
koohiiStory2: The first SHELLS you get you obviously spend, but the NEXT SHELLS are your ASSETS, you should bury them in a low safe place (placement!).
jp_example_words:
資格(しかく): qualifications, requirements, capabilities
資金(しきん): funds, capital
資産(しさん): property, fortune, means, assets
投資(とうし): investment
物資(ぶっし): goods, materials
融資(ゆうし): financing, loan
資源(しげん): resources
資本(しほん): funds, capital
資料(しりょう): materials, data
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The next shellfish will be yours, but this shellfish will be mine. These are the resources we have to share and distribute.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Our resources are based around a system of trading shellfish. It's not that weird, plenty of ancient societies used shellfish as their main resource!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You save up all of your resources so you can buy a sheep (し). You bring a big sack of your shellfish resources to the market and finally get to pick out that sheep you've had your eyes on for months.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Of course you're going to use your resources to get a sheep. You're living in a time when shellfish are used to trade for goods and services!
Ru_Meaning: assets, resources, capital, funds, data, be conducive to, contribute to
Ru_Radicals: ハ, 冫 (лёд), 欠 (недостача), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина)
Ru_trainchinese: zī: (графема) деньги, товары, ресурсы; природная способность; квалификация; материалы, данные; поддерживать, помогать, предоставлять
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the next (次) shellfish (貝) will have assets
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The next best thing after shells (money) is assets.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " Bei " to " Time " sound. The original meaning is the general term for money and goods. "Shuowen": "Capital, goods. Congbei, infrasound." Such as "Mandarin. "Qi Yu": "It's a territorial confinement, without receiving its capital." Wei Zhao's note: "Capital, capital." "Han Feizi. "Jie Lao": "The so-called honest person must live and die, but also light and wealth." "Historical Records. "Leveling Book": "The ancients tried to exhaust the world's resources to serve them, but they thought they were inadequate."

" Capital " means savings and accumulation. "Shuowen" paragraph note: "The capitalist, the accumulation." Such as "Mandarin. "Vietnamese": "The Jia people heard by the ministers, in summer, they have the skin, in the winter, they have the money, the drought is the boat, and the water is the car, just waiting for lack." "Historical Records. "The Biography of Wei Gongzi": "It is heard that Ji's father was killed by a man, like Ji Zi's three years, and he wants to avenge his father since the king, but there is no way to get it." Sima Zhen "Suo Yin": "The capitalist, the animal also It is said that it has been three years since I want to be the capital of my father’s recovery."

" Capital " also means funding and supply. Such as "Warring States Policy. "Qin Ce IV": "Wang and his ministers traveled for thousands of gold, and he listened to Han and Wei, and his courtiers were in Qin, namely Han and Wei Cong." Gao You's note: "Capital, give it." "Zhuangzi. Great Master": "Why Yao Ziyou?" Guo Xiang's Note: "The capitalist, giving money is what it means." "Historical Records. "The Biography of Su Qin": "So I got Su Qin carts, horses, golden silks, and even Zhao."

" Capital " means to rely on and rely on. Such as "Pipe. "Overlord": "The state is cultivated but the neighboring countries are innocent, and the overlord has the capital." "Huainanzi. "Zhushu": "The husband who makes the ship's right and left within the radius of seven feet, uses water as his capital." "Selected Works. Yan Yannian "Prince Prince Shi Dianhui Compose Poems": "With this knowledge, I will follow the scriptures." Li Shan's note: "Capital, still borrowed."

" Capital " means utilization and access. Such as "Rituals. "Mourning Clothes": "If you have more, you will return to the sect, but if you don't have enough, you will get the sect." Zheng Xuan's note: "Capital, take also." "Book of Rites. "Ming Tang Wei": "The world thinks that there is a country with Tao. That is why the world is gifted with rituals and music." "Laozi. Chapter Twenty-seven": "Those who are not good are the resources of good people."

" Capital " means talent and aptitude. Such as "Xunzi. "Nature Evil": "The nature of today's human being is born away from its simplicity, and away from its capital, it will be lost and lost." Yang Jie's note: "Capital, material." "Historical Records. The Biography of Shang Jun: "Shang Jun, his talent is mean." "Han. "Zhang Chen Wang Zhou Chuan": "However, the king is insulting people, and he can't get a man of integrity." Yan Shigu's note: "Licence is also natural."

" Capital " also means qualifications and status. Such as "Selected Works. Gan Lingsheng "Jin Ji General Lun": "And the children of the nobles of the family, Lingmai surpasses, and does not restrict the level of capital." "Three Kingdoms. Wei Shu. "The Biography of Xun Yu Xun You Jia Xu": "Should rely on the world's capital, calmly decorate the wisdom, in order to gain reputation, and the few who are incompetent and want to ask more return."

" Capital " is commonly referred to as "赍". Zhu Junsheng "Shu Wen Tong Xun Ding Sheng": "Capital, borrowing is also a 赍." Such as "Zhou Li. Chunguan. "Towel car": "Destroyed, enter the coin." Zheng Xuan's note quoted Du Zichunyun: "Yun, read as capital. Assets are also wealth. Those who are destroyed in an official car will receive wealth to pay for the straightforwardness of governance." Historical Records. Chen's Prime Minister's Family: "Ping will marry the daughter of the Zhang family, and use her fortune, and her travels will grow." Mawangdui Han Tomb silk book "Lao Zi Jiaben" line 147: "The bad person, the good person's money (capital) is also."
humanum_short_description_en: From " Bei " to " Infra " sound. The original meaning is the general term for money and goods.
humanum_full_description:
從「貝」，「次」聲。本義是錢財、貨物的總稱。《說文》：「資，貨也。从貝，次聲。」如《國語．齊語》：「正其封疆，無受其資。」韋昭注：「資，資財也。」《韓非子．解老》：「所謂廉者，必生死之命也，輕恬資財也。」《史記．平準書》：「古者嘗竭天下之資財以奉其上，猶自以為不足也。」

　　「資」引申指積蓄、積累。《說文》段注：「資者，積也。」如《國語．越語》：「臣聞之賈人，夏則資皮，冬則資絺，旱則資舟，水則資車，以待乏也。」《史記．魏公子列傳》：「嬴聞如姬父為人所殺，如姬資之三年，自王以下欲求報其父仇，莫能得。」司馬貞《索隱》：「資者，畜也。謂欲為父復讎之資，畜於心已得三年矣。」

　　「資」又表示資助、供給。如《戰國策．秦策四》：「王資臣萬金而遊，聽之韓、魏，入其社稷之臣於秦，即韓、魏從。」高誘注：「資，給也。」《莊子．大宗師》：「堯何以資汝？」郭象注：「資者，給濟之謂。」《史記．蘇秦列傳》：「於是資蘇秦車馬金帛以至趙。」

　　「資」表示依靠、憑借。如《管子．霸言》：「國修而鄰國無道，霸王之資也。」《淮南子．主術》：「夫七尺之橈而制船之左右者，以水為資。」《文選．顏延年〈皇太子釋奠會作詩〉》：「資此夙知，降從經志。」李善注：「資，猶藉也。」

　　「資」表示利用、取用。如《儀禮．喪服》：「有餘則歸之宗，不足則資之宗。」鄭玄注：「資，取也。」《禮記．明堂位》：「天下以為有道之國。是故天下資禮樂焉。」《老子．二十七章》：「不善人者，善人之資。」

　　「資」表示天賦、資質。如《荀子．性惡》：「今人之性，生而離其朴，離其資，必失而喪之。」楊倞注：「資，材也。」《史記．商君列傳》：「商君，其天資刻薄人也。」《漢書．張陳王周傳》：「然大王資侮人，不能得廉節之士。」顏師古注：「資，謂天性也。」

　　「資」還表示資歷、地位。如《文選．干令升〈晉紀總論〉》：「而世族貴戚之子弟，陵邁超越，不拘資次。」《三國志．魏書．荀彧荀攸賈詡傳》：「紹憑世資，從容飾智，以收名譽，故士之寡能好問者多歸之。」

　　「資」通作「齎」。朱駿聲《說文通訓定聲》：「資，叚借又為齎。」如《周禮．春官．巾車》：「毀折，入齎于職幣。」鄭玄注引杜子春云：「齎，讀為資。資謂財也。乘官車毀折者，入財以償繕治之直。」《史記．陳丞相世家》：「平既娶張氏女，齎用益饒，游道日廣。」馬王堆漢墓帛書《老子甲本》第147行：「不善人，善人之齎（資）也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「貝」，「次」聲。本義是錢財、貨物的總稱。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
資 (Simplified: 资)
Pinyin: zī
English Definition: resources; capital; to provide; to supply; to support; money; expense
Total strokes: 13; Radical: 貝
Pictophonetic: 次 indicates the sound; 貝 (money) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 次 [ cì ] order, sequence; second, next; one after the other
    • 貝 [ bèi ] sea shell; money, currency
Example Words:
資金 [ zī jīn ]: funds; funding; capital
資源 [ zī yuán ]: Ziyuan county in Guilin 桂林 , Guangxi
資源 [ zī yuán ]: natural resource (such as water or minerals); resource (such as manpower or tourism)
資料 [ zī liào ]: material; resources; data; information; profile (Internet); Classifiers: 份
More: 資* | *資 | *資*
hanziyuan:
Traditional in your browser 繁体字的浏览器显示:資

Traditional in Unicode standard 繁体字的Unicode标准:U+8CC7

Older traditional characters 旧繁体字/异体字: Not exist

Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:资

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+8D44

Main pronunciation 主要发音: zī

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning wealth

English senses 英语理解: property; wealth; capital

Usage example 用法举例: 資產 zī chǎn (capital)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 313

Shuowen 说文解字: 貨也從貝次聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 資 from cowry (贝)貝 bèi and phonetic person-spitting 次 cì (not- 㳄 xián) C784 資<貲> simp 资.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :

Simplification rule :

Simplification rule explained :

Variant rule : C784 資<貲>

Variant rule clarification :
資 (wealth, property, capital) TW 貲 <property, wealth, to count>

Applied rules : B004 贝貝

New font rule :

There is no known oracle characters found. 没.

There is no known bronze characters found. 没.

Liushutong characters (12)

資資RS
资资 		property, wealth, capital, assets, resources, contribute
  • people ranked 次 according to money 貝: wealth
(Simplified: 资)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 次 indicates the sound; 貝 (money) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 次 [ cì ] order, sequence; second, next; one after the other
    • 貝 [ bèi ] sea shell; money, currency
①財物，錢財：資源。物資。資財。資金。資費。資料。工資。川資(路費)。
②經營工商業的本錢和財產：資本。外資。獨資。合資。資方。
③供給，幫助：資助。資送。資敵。可資借鑑。
④智慧能力：資質。天資。
⑤出身和經歷：資格。資歷。
⑥姓氏。

資料 [ zī liào ]: material; resources; data; information; profile (Internet); Classifiers: 份

Heisig: The first shells (money) you earn, you use to pay your debts. From then on, the next shells you accumulate become your assets.

koohii1: Assets are the next best thing to money.
koohii2: The first SHELLS you get you obviously spend, but the NEXT SHELLS are your ASSETS, you should bury them in a low safe place (placement!).
Meaning: assets

Kind: traditional

從「 貝 」，「 次 」聲。本義是錢財、貨物的總稱。《說文》：「資，貨也。从貝，次聲。」如《國語．齊語》：「正其封疆，無受其資。」韋昭注：「資，資財也。」《韓非子．解老》：「所謂廉者，必生死之命也，輕恬資財也。」《史記．平準書》：「古者嘗竭天下之資財以奉其上，猶自以為不足也。」 「 資 」引申指積蓄、積累。《說文》段注：「資者，積也。」如《國語．越語》：「臣聞之賈人，夏則資皮，冬則資絺，旱則資舟，水則資車，以待乏也。」《史記．魏公子列傳》：「嬴聞如姬父為人所殺，如姬資之三年，自王以下欲求報其父仇，莫能得。」司馬貞《索隱》：「資者，畜也。謂欲為父復讎之資，畜於心已得三年矣。」 「 資 」又表示資助、供給。如《戰國策．秦策四》：「王資臣萬金而遊，聽之韓、魏，入其社稷之臣於秦，即韓、魏從。」高誘注：「資，給也。」《莊子．大宗師》：「堯何以資汝？」郭象注：「資者，給濟之謂。」《史記．蘇秦列傳》：「於是資蘇秦車馬金帛以至趙。」 「 資 」表示依靠、憑借。如《管子．霸言》：「國修而鄰國無道，霸王之資也。」《淮南子．主術》：「夫七尺之橈而制船之左右者，以水為資。」《文選．顏延年〈皇太子釋奠會作詩〉》：「資此夙知，降從經志。」李善注：「資，猶藉也。」 「 資 」表示利用、取用。如《儀禮．喪服》：「有餘則歸之宗，不足則資之宗。」鄭玄注：「資，取也。」《禮記．明堂位》：「天下以為有道之國。是故天下資禮樂焉。」《老子．二十七章》：「不善人者，善人之資。」 「 資 」表示天賦、資質。如《荀子．性惡》：「今人之性，生而離其朴，離其資，必失而喪之。」楊倞注：「資，材也。」《史記．商君列傳》：「商君，其天資刻薄人也。」《漢書．張陳王周傳》：「然大王資侮人，不能得廉節之士。」顏師古注：「資，謂天性也。」 「 資 」還表示資歷、地位。如《文選．干令升〈晉紀總論〉》：「而世族貴戚之子弟，陵邁超越，不拘資次。」《三國志．魏書．荀彧荀攸賈詡傳》：「紹憑世資，從容飾智，以收名譽，故士之寡能好問者多歸之。」 「 資 」通作「 齎 」。朱駿聲《說文通訓定聲》：「資，叚借又為齎。」如《周禮．春官．巾車》：「毀折，入齎于職幣。」鄭玄注引杜子春云：「齎，讀為資。資謂財也。乘官車毀折者，入財以償繕治之直。」《史記．陳丞相世家》：「平既娶張氏女，齎用益饒，游道日廣。」馬王堆漢墓帛書《老子甲本》第147行：「不善人，善人之齎（資）也。」

Such as "Rituals. "Mourning Clothes": "If you have more, you will return to the sect, but if you don't have enough, you will get the sect." Zheng Xuan's note: "Capital, take also." "Book of Rites. "Ming Tang Wei": "The world thinks that there is a country with Tao. That is why the world is gifted with rituals and music." "Laozi. Chapter Twenty-seven": "Those who are not good are the resources of good people." " Capital" means talent and aptitude. Such as "Xunzi. "Nature Evil": "The nature of today's human being is born away from its simplicity, and away from its capital, it will be lost and lost." Yang Jie's note: "Capital, material." "Historical Records. The Biography of Shang Jun: "Shang Jun, his talent is mean." "Han. "Zhang Chen Wang Zhou Chuan": "However, the king is insulting people, and he can't get a man of integrity." Yan Shigu's note: "Licence is also natural." " Capital" also means qualifications and status. Such as "Selected Works. Gan Lingsheng "Jin Ji General Lun": "And the children of the nobles of the family, Lingmai surpasses, and does not restrict the level of capital." "Three Kingdoms. Wei Shu. "The Biography of Xun Yu Xun You Jia Xu": "Should rely on the world's capital, calmly decorate the wisdom, in order to gain reputation, and the few who are incompetent and want to ask more return." " Capital" is commonly referred to as " 赍". Zhu Junsheng "Shu Wen Tong Xun Ding Sheng": "Capital, borrowing is also a 赍." Such as "Zhou Li. Chunguan. "Towel car": "Destroyed, enter the coin." Zheng Xuan's note quoted Du Zichunyun: "Yun, read as capital. Assets are also wealth. Those who are destroyed in an official car will receive wealth to pay for the straightforwardness of governance." Historical Records. Chen's Prime Minister's Family: "Ping will marry the daughter of the Zhang family, and use her fortune, and her travels will grow." Mawangdui Han Tomb silk book "Lao Zi Jiaben" line 147: "The bad person, the good person's money (capital) is also."

資字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zī］
［《廣韻》即夷切，平脂，精。］
“资1”的繁体字。亦作“1”。“齎2”的被通假字。
(1)货物，钱财。
(2)指粮食。
(3)赖以生活的来源。
(4)蓄积；蓄藏。
(5)资助；供给。
(6)凭借；依靠。
(7)贩卖。
(8)取用；求取；利用。
(9)具有；具备。
(10)禀赋，才质。
(11)材料；资料。
(12)门第；声望；阅历。
(13)官职；职位。
(14)指官阶；级别。
(15)减。
(16)时。
(17)锋利。参见“資斧”。
(18)资方、资本家和资产阶级的简称。
(19)用为资产阶级思想的简称。
(20)通“齎”。送。
(21)通“”。粗布。参见“資衰”。
(22)赋税。参见“資課”。
(23)通“咨”。商量；咨询。
(24)通“咨”。叹息声。
(25)通“至”。
(26)通“茨”。填塞。
(27)通“茨”。蒺藜。《吕氏春秋·任地》：“日至，苦菜死而資生。”高诱注：“菜名。”毕沅校正

資字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　資； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1208第05
【唐韻】卽夷切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】津私切，?音咨。【說文】貨也。【易·旅卦】旅卽次，懷其資。【註】必獲次舍，懷來資貨。　又【易·乾卦】萬物資始。【釋文】資，取也。　又【儀禮·聘禮】問歲月之資。【註】資，行用也。又【五經文字】齎，與資同。【儀禮·少牢饋食禮】資黍于羊俎兩端。【註】資，猶減也。今文資作齎。　又與咨同。【禮·緇衣】民惟曰怨資。【尚書】作咨。　又姓。【玉海】資氏。【?留·風俗傳】黃帝之後。【四明志】會稽有資氏。　又【集韻】資四切。與恣同。秦刻石文恣作資。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zī］
["Guangyun" is cut, flat fat, refined. ]
Traditional characters for "资1". Also known as "1". "赍2" was passed falsely.
(1) Goods, money.
(2) Refers to food.
(3) The source of life.
(4) Accumulation; accumulation.
(5) Funding; supply.
(6) Rely on; rely on.
(7) Selling.
(8) Take; ask for; use.
(9) Have; Have.
(10) Endowment, talent and quality.
(11) Materials; data.
(12) Family; prestige; experience.
(13) Official position; position.
(14) Refers to official rank; rank.
(15) Minus.
(16) o'clock.
(17) Sharp. See "capital axe".
(18) Abbreviation for capitalist, capitalist and bourgeoisie.
(19) Used as an abbreviation for bourgeois thought.
(20) Through "赍". give away.
(21) Pass "". coarse cloth. See "capital decline".
(22) Taxation. See "Supply Lessons".
(23) Through "consultation". Discuss; consult.
(24) Through "consultation". Sigh.
(25) Link "to".
(26) Through "Ci". Stuffing.
(27) Through "Ci". Tribulus. "Lu Shi Chun Qiu · Ren Di": "When the day arrives, bitter vegetables die but make a living." Gao You's note: "The name of the dish." Bi Yuan corrected

Name meaning
Nothing.
zī
вм. 资
Radicals: 次, 貝  (next, shellfish)
Meaning Mnemonic
The next shellfish will be yours, but this shellfish will be mine. These are the resources we have to share and distribute.
Our resources are based around a system of trading shellfish. It's not that weird, plenty of ancient societies used shellfish as their main resource!
Reading Mnemonic
You save up all of your resources so you can buy a sheep (し). You bring a big sack of your shellfish resources to the market and finally get to pick out that sheep you've had your eyes on for months.
Of course you're going to use your resources to get a sheep. You're living in a time when shellfish are used to trade for goods and services!
